text: Dindiri is a settlement village in Kilifi county within Kilifi South Constituency and Chasimba Ward. Its native occupants are the Chonyi, a sub tribe of the large Mijikenda. Its major economic activities are substance agriculture of maize, Beans, Peas, Cassava, Rice, watermelon etc. With a population of approx.4300 it has one public primary school,and one Day Secondary School with no health facility, no vocational centre nor an administration centre.Kenya's Kilifi County. == References == Category:Populated places in Coast Province Category:Kilifi County
title: Dindiri
